string.description: name of the ClusterExport
resource content will be returned as it was at the time of this git hash
A short description of the export rules.
Cluster Publisher name.
NATS or Jetstream subject.

bool.description: If true, the subject name is based on the received JsPath.

string.description: A prefix to be appended to the subject in case it's based on the received JsPath.

list_nested.description: List of NATS cluster destination where metrics must be exported.

bool.description: Specifies if the Export rules are enabled or not.

list.description: List of Alarm types to exclude.
List of Alarm types to include. Set it to '*' for all.
List of namespaces to export alarms from.

single_nested.description: Defines Alarms as export source

list.description:
Fields to export from the EDB table set in `spec.query.path`.
Exports all fields if not specified.

bool.description: Include the export timestamp in the published message.

string.description: Export mode.

The EDB path to export, in the format '.node.srl.interface'.
Should NOT include the namespace element.

int64.description: Export period in seconds. Applicable if mode is set to 'periodic' or 'both'.

string.description: A where clause to use for the query, e.g. 'oper-state = down'. You can omit enclosing parentheses.

list_nested.description: Defines a custom query as export source

single_nested.description: Define data sources to be exported to a NATS cluster.
ClusterExportSpec defines the desired state of ClusterExport
ClusterExportStatus defines the observed state of ClusterExport

string.description: a comma-separated list of resource fields to fetch/return.  If unspecified, all fields are fetched.  If empty, only key-fields are fetched.
an EQL "where" expression that will be used to filter the set of resources returned.
a label selector string to filter the results based on CR labels

string.description: name of the ClusterPublisher
resource content will be returned as it was at the time of this git hash
Comma-separated NATS or Jetstream cluster addresses
NATS client name.
NATS Credentials. A secret name with a 'username' and 'password' keys.

int64.description: The maximum outstanding async publishes that can be inflight at one time
The maximum time (in seconds) a sync publisher waits for an acknowledgment.

string.description: Path to a certificate authority file.
The client certificate file location.
The client private key location.

bool.description: If true the client will not verify the server's certificate.

single_nested.description: NATS client TLS configuration.

string.description: The NATS cluster type: NATS or Jetstream

single_nested.description: ClusterPublisherSpec defines the desired state of ClusterPublisher

bool.description: Specifies if the client is connected to the NATS cluster

string.description: Error value if the client is not connected
Last time the connection was checked

single_nested.description: ClusterPublisherStatus defines the observed state of ClusterPublisher
